emergence

Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • emergence.Environment

  • public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
    The Environment class safes all the observation of the environment that were made by simulating using the simulator class. It tracks the blocking, scoring, loosing and winning sprites. For that there are some information before and after advancing are needed. Use the update method to keep the environment really up to date.
